project.name: C-C129A-FFMP-02-ST03-DT06-DF15-CF01-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C129A-FFMP-02-ST03-DT06-DF15-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Good input:1) environment variable contains only alphanumeric charactersBad input:1) environment variable contains * or -. + causes infinte loop

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="exampleofgoodinput" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
